Room.Name: Grape Picker's Shacks
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the center of a group of shacks in the Chateau Richland Orchard.
Room.LongDescription: The shacks are well cared for, but they are still just shacks. A small pond of water lies to the west and you can see a number of very ugly children playing there. A large barn is to the north, and you can see a few people working in there. The grape vines cover a vast area behind the barn and past the pond.
